text:
="preserve">The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland is a 1999 video game. In this game, Elmo loses his blanket and both the blanket and Elmo end up in Grouchland. It was released in October 1999 in the United States. It is based on the movie of the same name. It was made for Windows.
It was also released on the Game Boy Color in October 1999.

annotations.surface_form: the movie of the same name
